00012         class Gate
00013         {
00018                 public $controller;
00019                 
00024                 public $action;
00025                 
00030                 public $params;
00031                 
00038                 public static function by_URI($the_URI, $params = NULL)
00039                 {
00040                         $gate = new self();
00041                         
00042                         if (isset($params))
00043                         {
00044                                 eval("\$prm = $params;");
00045                                 $gate->params = $prm;
00046                         }
00047                         else
00048                         {
00049                                 $parts = explode('?', $the_URI);
00050                                 $qs = @$parts[1];
00051                         
00052                                 $qs_parts = explode('&', $qs);
00053                                 foreach ($qs_parts as $qs_part)
00054                                 {
00055                                         $qs_part_parts = explode('=', $qs_part);
00056                                         $gate->params[urldecode($qs_part_parts[0])] = 
00057                                                 urldecode(@$qs_part_parts[1]);
00058                                 }
00059                         }
00060                                                 
00061                         $gate->controller = ucwords($gate->params['controller']);
00062                         $gate->action = isset($gate->params['action']) ?
00063                                 $gate->params['action'] : 'index';
00064                         
00065                         unset($gate->params['controller']);
00066                         unset($gate->params['action']);
00067                         
00068                         return $gate;
00069                 }
00070                 
00075                 public function __toString()
00076                 {
00077                         $params = $this->params;
00078                         array_walk($params, create_function('&$val, $key',
00079                                 '$val = span("$key", array(\'class\' => \'code-array-key\')) . ' .
00080                                 'span(\' => \', array(\'class\' => \'code-delimiter\')) . ' .
00081                                 'span("\'$val\'", array(\'class\' => \'code-literal\'));'));
00082                         $params = empty($params) ? '' : implode(span(', ', array('class' => 'code-delimiter')), $params);
00083                         return span("{$this->controller}Controller", array('class' => 'code-class')) .
00084                                 span('::', array('class' => 'code-operator')) .
00085                                 span($this->action, array('class' => 'code-method')) .
00086                                 span('(', array('class' => 'code-delimiter')) .
00087                                 span($params, array('class' => 'code-method-params')) .
00088                                 span(')', array('class' => 'code-delimiter'));
00089                 }
00090         }
